Я являюсь специалистом в области IT с 6: I am an IT specialist with 6 years of experience in information technology
Занимался разработкой программного обесп: My experience includes developing software for microcontrollers used at railway stations, writing service programs in C++ for the Linux operating system and creating SPA applications using React
Моя цель - создавать пользовательские ин: My goal is to create user interfaces that are not only beautiful but also user-friendly. I follow advanced technologies and development methodologies to ensure the best quality and efficiency of my projects
разработка кроссплатформенных приложений: development of cross-platform applications on Qt
создание сервисов под ОС Linux на С++: creating services for Linux in C++
Проект интерфейса популярной социальной: The project of the interface of a popular social network. The following functions are implemented: displaying a list of posts according to the database, displaying information for each post, searching for posts by hashtag, displaying the user's video history.
Проект лендинга по продаже ароматических: A landing page project for the sale of scented candles
Проект для работы с постами. Реализованы: A project for working with posts. The following functions are implemented: pagination, interaction with the server, library of UI components, registration/authorization, creation/deletion of posts, sorting/search, slider, modal window, pagination... For more information, see the <About site> page of the project.
Проект для работы со статьями. Реализова: A project for working with articles. The following functions are implemented: pagination, interaction with the server, registration/authorization, creation/deletion/editing of articles, sorting, pagination... For more information, see the <About site> page of the project.
Проект интернет-магазина детских игрушек: The project of an online store for children's toys. The following functions are implemented: page-by-page navigation, interaction with the server, registration/authorization, working with the product database, sorting/filtering/searching for products, creating comments, shopping cart, pagination... For more information, see the <About site> page of the project.
Проект сайта-портфолио фронтенд-разработ: Website project-portfolio of a frontend developer
адаптивная вёрстка многостраничного сайт: adaptive layout of a multi-page website
